title: Peace and Love Protocol | Chiropractic Injury Treatment & Prevention in Philadelphia — Movement Medicine
description: Our doctor of chiropractic, Dr. Joel Gyimesi, believes in utilizing the Peace and Love Protocol for injuries (back, knee, neck, shoulder, hip, etc.) and treatment of pain conditions.
cleaned_text: peace + love protocol When dealing with an injury more often than not you might have come across a protocol called RICE. RICE stands for rest, ice, compress, elevate. While some of these tactics can be helpful, this method is outdated. Current studies have shown that icing and prolonged resting alone can be counterproductive in recovering from an injury. As they say out with the old and in with the new! Let's introduce you to the PEACE + LOVE Protocol.
